titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: MICROSCOPIC INVOLVEMENT INDICATOR (PARAMETRIUM) - Description

body.p: MICROSCOPIC INVOLVEMENT INDICATOR (PARAMETRIUM) is the same as attribute MICROSCOPIC INVOLVEMENT INDICATOR FOR PARAMETRIUM OR CERVICAL STROMA to indicate if there is microscopic involvement of the parametrium (the connective TISSUE and fat adjacent to the uterus) during a Gynaecological Cancer Care Spell .
